body: The following spells grant temporary hero points or prevent characters from using hero points.
name: Hero Point Spells
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells

sections.body: This spell grants 1 hero point to the target. This hero point must be spent before the duration expires, or it is lost. The bonus hero point is spent before any other hero points the target might possess.
sections.description: Grants one hero point to a character
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells/Heroic Fortune
sections.level_text: alchemist: 2; investigator: 2; bard: 2; skald: 2; cleric: 2; oracle: 2; warpriest: 2; paladin: 3
sections.component_text: V, S, DF, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
sections.name: Heroic Fortune

sections.body: This spell functions like heroic fortune, except as noted above.
sections.description: Grants one hero point to all characters in range
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells/Heroic Fortune/Mass
sections.component_text: V, S, DF, M (diamond dust worth 1,000 gp)

effects.text: one or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Targets

sections.name: Heroic Fortune, Mass

sections.body: You utter a dire curse over the body of a dying creature, allowing you to consume its waning life force. Upon casting this spell, you touch a living creature that has –1 or fewer hit points. If the target fails its saving throw, it dies and you gain 1 hero point for every 5 Hit Dice possessed by the target (minimum 1, maximum 3). These hero points last for a number of minutes equal to the target's Hit Dice. Any hero points remaining when this spell ends are lost.
sections.description: You curse a dying creature to gain hero points.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells/Malediction
sections.duration: instantaneous/1 minute per HD of the target; see text
sections.component_text: V, S, F (onyx dust worth 500 gp)
sections.name: Malediction

sections.body: You curse the target, preventing it from drawing upon the powers of destiny. The target is shaken and cannot use hero points for the duration of the spell. This effect can be removed by dispel magic, remove curse, or other similar effects.
sections.description: You curse the target causing them to be shaken and preventing them from using hero points.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells/Severed Fate
sections.name: Severed Fate

sections.body: You utter a dire portent, causing destiny and fate to unravel around the target. This profoundly disturbing effect causes the target to suffer a cumulative –2 penalty on all ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks for every hero point it possesses. The target can reduce this penalty by spending hero points normally, but it takes 2d6 points of damage for each hero point spent while this spell is in effect.
sections.description: Target suffers a penalty to multiple rules for every hero point they possess.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Hero Points/Hero Point Spells/Unravel Destiny
sections.level_text: cleric: 3; oracle: 3; warpriest: 3; sorcerer: 3; wizard: 3; arcanist: 3; witch: 3
sections.name: Unravel Destiny
